fields.label: Client references- spread sheet of three references-Company, First Name, Second Name, Position, Address, City, State, Zip, Phone, Zip Code, No. of Yrs as a Client, Ave Annual spend
fields.name: client_references
fields.instructions: Funders will want to speak to at least three client references to understand how well you do your job and if clients are loyal to your business.

fields.label: Vendor references- spread sheet of three references-Company, First Name, Second Name, Position, Address, City, State, Zip, Phone, Zip Code, No. of Yrs as a Client, Ave Annual spend
fields.name: vendor_references
fields.instructions: Funders will want to find out if you are a good customer, get an opinion on the strength of the business and how ethical you run your business.

fields.label: Personal Non-Business References-spread sheet of three references-First Name, Second Name, Position, Address, City, State, Zip, Phone, Zip Code, No. of Yrs knowing applicant
fields.name: personal_refences
fields.instructions: Funders want to learn from people that know you well what kind of person you are, your work ethic and integrity.
